Title: AJAX Control Extenders
Description: A group of ajax control extenders to be added to as I develop them.
HomeWiki:
A library of control extenders based around the ASP.Net AJAX Control Toolkit. The intent is to add to these as needs arise, eventually developing a functional toolset of extenders for everyday use.

You will need version 3.0.20229 of the ASP.Net AJAX Control Toolkit http://www.codeplex.com/AtlasControlToolkit/Release/ProjectReleases.aspx?ReleaseId=11121 as a reference in your project to utilise these extenders. See the demo project in the source for an example.
